transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha ji
Customer: ha ji sir ji good evening Riti Rathore baat kar rahi hu India Mart se doctor
Customer: ha ji sir pa minute me karunga aapko call pa minute me
Executive: sir fir ek kam karte hai kal subah mai aapko lagati hu kyuki abhi to mai office se nikal rahi thi to mai socha ek bar aapse baat kar leti hu
Customer: aap baat kar lijiye jo jo use karte hai na unse baat kar lijiye mai staff se baat kar
Executive: acha acha thik hai kara dijiye
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: ha ji sir ji good evening bataiye
Executive: ha ji ha ji mam boliye
Customer: actually maine isliye call kiya tha aapka service me abhi kuch kuch problem aa rahi thi mujhe Saloni ne bataya tha aapke sath me meeting hui hogi ya to Raju ji ke sath me hui hogi to kya problem aa rahi hai sold out lead ka concern aa raha hai aapko
Customer: lead show nahi hoti turant nikal jati hai
Executive: acha ek minute rukiyega
Customer: zero second bhi nahi judti hai
Executive: isme na sir hamara do category me chal raha hai ek to gym setup wale me aur dusra hamara outdoor gym equipment wale me to abhi chal raha hai na to maine abhi jo hai outdoor gym equipment wale ko dekha tha pichle do mahine me matlab aapke end se lead consumption nahi ho pa raha hai ye matlab mujhe lead nahi mil rahi dusri category me to aapki end se lead consume ho rahi hai
Customer: ek aadhe page ka aata hai na ek aadhe page ka nahi hai bulk wala kya bol rahe hai sir
Customer: ek aadhe page ka hi aata hai na fir wo hum follow nahi na karte aap dekho to sahi na konsi by lead chahiye outdoor ki
Executive: nahi nahi mai sirf premium category wale ki hi baat kar rahi hu gym setup wala aur aapka outdoor gym equipment wala ye do category ka to bakiyo me to aap kar rahe hai aur usme jo further scope hoga wo mai aur corrections kara ke de dungi mai dekh rahi thi kuch kuch waha pe corrections hai to kal mai wo account manager se aapki karwa dungi in dono me mai ek bar iske na mere ko analysis kar leti hu mai kyuki agar bar bar sold out ka problem aa raha hai ya nahi kharid pa rahe hai hum to isme ek kam kar ke dekh sakte hai agar kuch feasibility lagti hai if we can change the category to abhi ke liye change kar dete hai kyuki mujhe outdoor gym equipment me na last month me thoda sa traffic me bhi lag raha hai ki downfall hua hai kyuki isme 350 lead aati thi pichle mahine me 238 lead hi aayi hai matlab itni hi approve hui hai to pichle mahine ya to festival ki vajah se ya jis bhi reason ki vajah se kam hua hai to traffic me hi mujhe significant drop dikha hai outdoor gym equipment wala India Mart ke level pe to ya to isko is mahine me hum log track kare ki isme matlab is mahine me kitna kya aa raha hai kitna traffic aa raha hai kya chal raha hai aur dusra jo hai gym setup wala usme mai aapka jo bhi scope hai enrichment ka wo ek bar kara kar ke de deti hu to fir aap further isko observe kar lijiyega wo shayad last month me thoda sa challenge aaya tha kyuki last month me because of festivals bahut jyada the to dono category me thoda sa traffic ka hi mujhe drop dikh raha hai that could be a reason
Executive: thik hai aur aap system ko aapka login mode pe chod ke rakhte hai matlab login mode pe rehta hai aapka
Customer: ha ji ha ji mam
Executive: thik hai to ek kam aur kar ke rakhiyega jo lead agar sold out hoti hai to usme na sham ko baith kar ke na kuch constant feedback mujhe dono category ke aapke end se chahiye honge ki constant feedback aap dal rahe ho dono me hi past me ja kar ke jo Saloni ne bataya hoga na aapko past me ja kar ke lead check karne ka tarika
Customer: ha ji ha ji mam diya hua hai past lead to usme ja kar ke aaye hum is tarike se
Executive: aur mai ek aur kar leti hu abhi jo hamari matlab team hai second team ka gym setup equipment ye mujhe show bhi nahi hui hai aur waha pe lead show ho rahi hai
Executive: mai bata deti hu sir lead pe kya hai na abhi mai dekh rahi hu ki you have a huge competition in by lead matlab usme leader hi pehle se bahut jyada abhi aa gaye hai matlab leader pehle jab maine deal ki thi us time pe itne leader nahi the jitne aaj ki date me mujhe dikh rahe hai to kare na upar to kahin na kahin nahi nahi to aapka to visibility dekhiye top par hi aa raha hai matlab aapki jo visibility hai that is that is coming jaise char suppliers ke beech me top me hi dikh rahi hai wo aap upar me hi dikh rahe ho kyuki aap service pe actively use karte ho to ye hai ek second nahi karti hai jab tak click karne jao lead
Customer: hmm to usme competition jyada ho gaya hai na sir aur ki supplier ka kya hai ki maine na aage bheja bhi tha is pe to aise cases pe matlab bhejne se kuch hai nahi 15 second
Executive: sir seconds me chali jati hai matlab pa second me even seconds me two seconds pe bhi lead chali jayegi matlab usme kuch kar nahi pate aapko bas wahi hai ki agar aapke pass auto refresher laga hua hai to baith kar ke dekhiye refresher laga hua hai mam computer pe kar rahe hai na mobile pe to fayda hi nahi hai to fir samne baith kar ke login kar ke rakhna hi padega usme aur dekh hi raha tha fir bhi
Executive: maine usme aur thoda sa enrichment ka aur wo dekh leti hu ki enrichment pe aur direct inquiry calls pe kitna kya flow hai wo ek bar mai aapko dekh kar ke bata deti hu very slow inquiry mam wo call ki flow to bahut hi jyada kam ho gayi hai pehle se
Customer: hmm hmm hmm hmm koi baat nahi mai ek bar dekhti hu sir pehle mai ek bar aap sare aur analysis kar lo detail me kal subah is pe kya kya kam ho sakta hai wo mai aapko ek bar bata deti hu thik hai
Customer: thik hai
Executive: thik hai thik hai sir ji okay
Customer: okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing sold out lead concern.

- Leads are disappearing quickly.

- Outdoor gym equipment lead consumption is low.

- Gym setup equipment not showing.



Resolution:

- Executive will analyze lead consumption issues.

- Executive will check enrichment scope for gym setup.

- Executive will check traffic drop in outdoor equipment.

- Executive advised constant feedback on sold out leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, gym equipment, traffic
